item.title: CVE-2022-29449|2024-09-16T16:18:41.740Z -- wpopal -- opal%20hotel%20room%20booking%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (contributor or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Opal Hotel Room Booking plugin <= 1.2.7 at WordPress.
